questions.name: classes-have-instances
questions.label: Classes must have instances
questions.description: Select this test if your ontology does not accept non-instantiated classes, i.e., classes that works as roles.

questions.name: top-level-classes
questions.label: Fixed top-level classes
questions.description: Select this test if users are prohibited to change the first level of the classes hierarchy. In this case, provide the list of the full URI of first-level classes (comma-separated).

questions.name: label-every-class
questions.label: Classes must have a label
questions.description: Each owl:Class must have at least one rdfs:label, which must be unique for each language.

questions.name: comment-every-class
questions.label: Classes must have a comment
questions.description: Each owl:Class must have at least one rdfs:comment, which must be unique for each language.

questions.name: no-multiple-superclass
questions.label: Classes must have at most one superclass
questions.description: Each owl:Class must have at most one superclass.

questions.name: class-without-subclass
questions.label: Some classes does not allow subclasses
questions.description: Select this test if no rdfs:subClassOf of any given owl:Class are allowed. In this case, provide the list of the full URI of all classes that does not allow subclasses (comma-separated).

questions.name: label-every-property
questions.label: Properties must have a label
questions.description: Each rdf:Property, owl:DatatypeProperty or owl:ObjectProperty must have at least one rdfs:label, which must be unique for each language.

questions.name: comment-every-property
questions.label: Properties must have a comment
questions.description: Each rdf:Property, owl:DatatypeProperty or owl:ObjectProperty must have at least one rdfs:comment, which must be unique for each language.

questions.name: no-multiple-domain
questions.label: Properties must have at most one domain
questions.description: Each rdf:Property, owl:DatatypeProperty or owl:ObjectProperty must have at most one rdfs:domain.

questions.name: must-have-domain
questions.label: Properties must have at least one domain, which is a class
questions.description: Each rdf:Property, owl:DatatypeProperty or owl:ObjectProperty must have at least one rdfs:domain that is defined as an owl:Class.

questions.name: no-multiple-range
questions.label: Properties must have at most one range
questions.description: Each rdf:Property, owl:DatatypeProperty or owl:ObjectProperty must have at most one rdfs:range.

questions.name: must-have-range
questions.label: Properties must have at least one range, which is a class
questions.description: Each rdf:Property, owl:DatatypeProperty or owl:ObjectProperty must have at least one rdfs:range that is defined as an owl:Class.

questions.name: no-multiple-superproperty
questions.label: Properties must have at most one superproperty
questions.description: Each rdf:Property, owl:DatatypeProperty or owl:ObjectProperty must have at most one superproperty
